#summary Encrypting API keys in Database
#labels Phase-Deploy

= API Key Encryption =

== Requirements ==

  * mcrypt PHP module

== How to ==
  # *BACKUP #__eve_accounts table*
  # Only for older versions: check length of apiKey field in DB. If it's only 64, change it to 255. Encrypted keys are longer.
  # Go to Components-> EVE -> Overview
  # Click on Encryption
  # Select Cipher and Mode (ECB is recommended)
  # Enter Pass Phrase
  # Choose, if people with backend access can view API key (Account Edit Form)
  # Confirm

The component will try create new config file in administrator/com_eve/configs directory. If the directory isn't writable, you'll have to copy contents from textarea and create it manually.
